location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Map showing extent of Sultan's influence in Oman'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:420 x 320 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map by Major G.P. Murphy, Political Agent, Muscat, attached to a report on the general situation in Oman, dated 30 October 1928 (folios 195-198). Shows the extent of Sultan’s influence and nominal rule exclusive of Gwadur and Dhofar.Labelled and coloured for reference with a key provided in the lower left.Signed 'G.P. Murphy' and dated ‘30.10.28’.
